Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.Zaitsev.implementor

Class Implementor

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.kgeorgiy.ja.Zaitsev.implementor.Implementor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Impler, JarImpler
    public class Implementor
extends java.lang.Object
implements JarImpler
    Implementation of JarImpler interface.

    Provides methods for generating .java and .jar files implementing the provided interface.

    Author:
    Zaitsev Ilya

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main class for implementor. Runs in two modes:
        • 2 arguments - className and outputPath - creates .java file by invoking implement(Class, Path).
        • 3 arguments - -jar, className and jarPath - creates .jar file by invoking implementJar(Class, Path).
        Parameters:
        args - The command line arguments.

      • toUnicode

        private static java.lang.String toUnicode​(java.lang.String text)
        Converts all unicode characters in text to unicode escape notation.
        Parameters:
        text - Text for conversion.
        Returns:
        string with characters in unicode escape notation.

      • implement

        public void implement​(java.lang.Class<?> token,
                      java.nio.file.Path root)
               throws ImplerException
        Produces code implementing interface specified by provided token.

        The name of the generated class is the same as the class name of the token type with the Impl suffix added. Generated source code will be placed in the subdirectory of the specified root directory.

        Specified by:
        implement in interface Impler
        Parameters:
        token - type token to create implementation for.
        root - root directory.
        Throws:
        ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

      • getArguments

        private static java.lang.String getArguments​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Returns arguments of provided method.
        Parameters:
        method - method whose arguments need to be returned.
        Returns:
        string containing all arguments of provided method.

      • getDefaultValue

        private java.lang.String getDefaultValue​(java.lang.Class<?> methodReturnType)
        Returns string representation of a default value for provided return type.
        Parameters:
        methodReturnType - return type of a method.
        Returns:
        null for all non-primitive classes and default value otherwise.

      • compile

        public static void compile​(java.lang.Class<?> token,
                           java.nio.file.Path dir,
                           java.lang.String className)
                    throws ImplerException
        Compiles class that implements token class
        Parameters:
        token - Type token of class for compilation.
        dir - Directory for compiled file.
        className - Class name in it's string form.
        Throws:
        ImplerException - If an exception occurred during compilation.

      • implementJar

        public void implementJar​(java.lang.Class<?> token,
                         java.nio.file.Path jarFile)
                  throws ImplerException
        Produces .jar file implementing interface specified by provided token.

        The name of the generated class is the same as the class name of the token type with the Impl suffix added.

        Specified by:
        implementJar in interface JarImpler
        Parameters:
        token - type token to create implementation for.
        jarFile - target .jar file.
        Throws:
        ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.
